definition: The word "binnen" refers to a specific time frame or a limited distance. It is commonly used to describe an event or occurrence that happens within a particular period or a short distance.

examples.german: Binnen einer Woche muss die Arbeit erledigt sein.
examples.english: The work must be completed within a week.

examples.german: Binnen weniger Stunden war der Sturm vorüber.
examples.english: Within a few hours, the storm was over.

examples.german: Binnen kurzer Zeit hat sich viel verändert.
examples.english: A lot has changed within a short time.

examples.german: Binnen weniger Minuten war der Zug abgefahren.
examples.english: Within a few minutes, the train had departed.

examples.german: Binnen eines Jahres hat sich die Situation verbessert.
examples.english: The situation has improved within a year.
